name: WONDER RACE
description:
Who will arrive first? Be the fastest to reach the finish line in this space race.

Between each run you will have the choice among several upgrades for your ship, but each upgrade will be followed by a penalty. It's up to you to make the best choice, or rather... the least worst.

The gamejam's theme was : Dilemma

The 3 themes we had to use :

  • Racing
  • Versus
  • Physics-based

A game made by the Calaisiens :

  • Abir LOUARD
  • Alexis SHAN YAN
  • Killian OECHSLIN
  • Quentin BONNET

THANKS FOR PLAYING !
